mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.jgbm AS "jgbm", a.store_id AS "storeId", a.store_name AS "storeName", a.drug_id AS "drugId", a.ybtybm AS "ybtybm", a.isjbyw AS "isjbyw", a.kss AS "kss", a.cmed_code AS "cmedCode", a.drug_detail_type AS "drugDetailType", a.dose_code AS "doseCode", a.drug_name AS "drugName", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.package_unit AS "packageUnit", a.package_qty AS "packageQty", a.sales_unit AS "salesUnit", a.sales_qty AS "salesQty", a.sales_relation AS "salesRelation", a.producer_name AS "producerName", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.sale_price AS "salePrice", a.cost_amt AS "costAmt", a.sale_amt AS "saleAmt", a.batch_no AS "batchNo", a.sdrugmanufacturers AS "sdrugmanufacturers", a.sdrughabitat AS "sdrughabitat", a.sratificationno AS "sratificationno", a.ddateproduce AS "ddateproduce", a.expiry AS "expiry", a.scrq AS "scrq"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM medsto_ypkcmx a
a.scrq is not null
AND a.drug_id LIKE concat('%',#{drugId},'%')
AND a.drug_name LIKE concat('%',#{drugName},'%')
AND a.drug_spec LIKE concat('%',#{drugSpec},'%')
AND a.producer_name LIKE concat('%',#{producerName},'%')
AND a.store_name LIKE concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
AND a.isjbyw = #{isjbyw}
AND a.kss = #{kss}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ypkcmx( xh, jgbm, store_id, store_name, drug_id, ybtybm, isjbyw, kss, cmed_code, drug_detail_type, dose_code, drug_name, drug_spec, package_unit, package_qty, sales_unit, sales_qty, sales_relation, producer_name, cost_price, sale_price, cost_amt, sale_amt, batch_no, sdrugmanufacturers, sdrughabitat, sratificationno, ddateproduce, expiry, scrq ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{jgbm}, #{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{drugId}, #{ybtybm}, #{isjbyw}, #{kss}, #{cmedCode}, #{drugDetailType}, #{doseCode}, #{drugName}, #{drugSpec}, #{packageUnit}, #{packageQty}, #{salesUnit}, #{salesQty}, #{salesRelation}, #{producerName}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{costAmt}, #{saleAmt}, #{batchNo}, #{sdrugmanufacturers}, #{sdrughabitat}, #{sratificationno}, #{ddateproduce}, #{expiry}, #{scrq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_ypkcmx SET xh = #{xh}, jgbm = #{jgbm}, store_id = #{storeId}, store_name = #{storeName}, drug_id = #{drugId}, ybtybm = #{ybtybm}, isjbyw = #{isjbyw}, kss = #{kss}, cmed_code = #{cmedCode}, drug_detail_type = #{drugDetailType}, dose_code = #{doseCode}, drug_name = #{drugName}, drug_spec = #{drugSpec}, package_unit = #{packageUnit}, package_qty = #{packageQty}, sales_unit = #{salesUnit}, sales_qty = #{salesQty}, sales_relation = #{salesRelation}, producer_name = #{producerName}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, cost_amt = #{costAmt}, sale_amt = #{saleAmt}, batch_no = #{batchNo}, sdrugmanufacturers = #{sdrugmanufacturers}, sdrughabitat = #{sdrughabitat}, sratificationno = #{sratificationno}, ddateproduce = #{ddateproduce}, expiry = #{expiry}, scrq = #{scrq} WHERE id = #{id}
